00028 #include "StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel.hpp"
00029 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00030 
00031 StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel()
00032 {
00033 }
00034 
00035 AbstractCellCycleModel* StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::CreateCellCycleModel()
00036 {
00037     // Create a new cell cycle model
00038     StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel* p_model = new StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel();
00039 
00040     // Set the values of the new cell cycle model's member variables
00041     p_model->SetGeneration(mGeneration);
00042     p_model->SetMaxTransitGenerations(mMaxTransitGenerations);
00043     p_model->SetCellProliferativeType(mCellProliferativeType);
00044 
00045     return p_model;
00046 }
00047 
00048 void StochasticDurationGenerationBasedCellCycleModel::SetG1Duration()
00049 {
00050     assert(mpCell != NULL);
00051 
00052     RandomNumberGenerator* p_gen = RandomNumberGenerator::Instance();
00053 
00054     switch (mCellProliferativeType)
00055     {
00056         case STEM:
00057             mG1Duration = 1 + 4*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,5] according to Meineke
00058             break;
00059         case TRANSIT:
00060             mG1Duration = 1 + 2*p_gen->ranf(); // U[1,3] according to Meineke
00061             break;
00062         case DIFFERENTIATED:
00063             mG1Duration = DBL_MAX;
00064             break;
00065         default:
00066             NEVER_REACHED;
00067     }
00068 }
00069
